path: artifacts/SportemonGo Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.SportemonGo: contracts/SportemonGo Full Smart Contract Security Audit/SportemonGo

findings.title: TakeFee always true
findings.description: The function `_transfer(address from, â€¦)` checks for excluded from fee addresses and should disable fees if there are some, but takeFee parameter never turns to false value.

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions `includeInReward()` and `_getCurrentSupply` use loops that could be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.
